UPDATE attendance SET attendance_end = TO_DATE(#{attendanceEnd},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} AND TO_CHAR(attendance_start, 'yyyy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd')
